event.title: May 2014, Columbia's Mayor and Town Council proposed

data.event: However, in May 2014, Columbia's Mayor and Town Council proposed disincorporation which, if successful, would result in the town being reabsorbed by the County.

event.title: June 2014, Preservation Virginia, a historic preservation group in the Commonwealth, placed

data.event: In June 2014, Preservation Virginia, a historic preservation group in the Commonwealth, placed the Town of Columbia on its "most endangered" list.
